attributes.action: Protect the consumer on the Internet by making on-line traders sign up to a code of practice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All businesses who trade on-line should be made to sign up to an Internet Code of Practice, ensuring that consumers get protection from unscrupulous companies and people who set up websites and collect personal & financial information. Currently the Office of Fair Trading does not go far enough with it's voluntary codes scheme. About time someone helped protect UK internet users.
